程序包 com.huaweicloud.sermant.router.spring.declarer

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AbstractDeclarer
    实例增强基类
    BaseLoadBalancerDeclarer
    Ribbon BaseLoadBalancer负载均衡增强类，筛选下游实例
    ClientHttpRequestDeclarer
    ClientHttpRequestInterceptor增强类，发起restTemplate请求方法
    EurekaHttpClientDeclarer
    EurekaHttpClient增强类，eureka注册方法
    FeignClientDeclarer
    Client增强类，发起feign请求方法
    HandlerExecutionChainDeclarer
    通过拦截增加注入拦截器，注入spring web拦截器
    HystrixActionDeclarer
    HystrixContexSchedulerAction增强类，设置线程参数
    LoadBalancerClientFilterDeclarer
    spring cloud gateway LoadBalancerClientFilter增强类，获取请求数据
    ServiceInstanceListSupplierDeclarer
    CachingServiceInstanceListSupplier/DiscoveryClientServiceInstanceListSupplier增强类，筛选下游实例
    ServiceRegistryDeclarer
    AbstractAutoServiceRegistration增强类，spring cloud注册方法
